internal.subject: <<Your Performance||An Observation||Just Saying>>
internal.body: I am <<really||very||quite||somewhat||especially>> <<happy with||disappointed with||sad about||confused about||content with|| ambivalent about>> your <<performance on||contribution to||opinion of>> the <<Henderson||Michaelson||Strongfellow||Samuelson||Flaherty>> <<account||report||sale||analysis>>.

internal.subject: <<Mega Millions||Powerball||Superbowl||World Series||Oscar>> Pool
internal.body: Last call to participate in the <<Mega Millions||Powerball||Superbowl||World Series||Oscar>> Pool, <<stop by my desk||swing by customer service||pop by the mail room>> by <<end of business||lunch time||lights out>> <<today||tomorrow||friday>>.

internal.subject: Re:<<Question||A little help||Can I get a few minutes of your time>>?
internal.body: <<You are welcome||You're welcome||No problem||My pleasure||Don't be silly, I was happy to help||No, thank YOU>>

external.subject: <<Hey You||My Dude||Long time||Reaching out>>
external.body: <<Hey||Wassup||Hi>>, it's Pam, from <<Freemont High||Banneker SHS||Coconut Grove Elementary||West Lab||Fort Lincoln>>. You probably don't remember me, but we are planning our reunion for next summer and wanted to see if you would be attending?

malware.body: Clearly the choice of the discerning gamer is the <<XBOX||PS4>>. To join the exclusive <<XBOX||PS4>> discount club, complete the following registration.
